entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Logic in GetOrCreateCompilationWithAnalyzersAsync doesn't seem to correctly update cached entries #62550
  • Using SourceGenerators leads to CS0016 when path is too long #62544
  • Warning suppressors should run insofar as not all errors are unsuppressible #62540
  • Introduce local adds redundant globally qualified namespace on local's type #62539

Closed

  • GetOrCreateCompilationWithAnalyzersAsync throwing null reference exception in integration tests #62381
  • Support 'file' modifier in "IDE0036: Order modifiers" analyzer #62407

PullRequests

Created

  • Store helpful info needed by incremental-generation on syntax-tree itself #62551
    Area-Compilers
  • Validation: Move remarks into summary #62549
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community
  • Fix possible race condition in AnalyzerConfigWithInferredIndentationOptions #62545
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Disable flakey integration tests" #62542
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Record completion of file-types #62505
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Increase timeout for unix single machine job #62393
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62546
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62548
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62547
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix null reference in DiagnosticIncrementalAnalyzer.CompilationManager #62513
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Features/editorconfig lsp #62484
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Support 'file' in order modifiers analyzer #62543
    Area-Analyzers, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62536
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62538
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62537
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Generate ReadyToRun binaries for OOP #62518
    Area-IDE
  • Validation: Change seealso to see #62555
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62554
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62553
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62552
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Theme some dialogs #55971
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Add LanguageVersion.CSharp11 #62496
    Area-Compilers
  • Run EndToEnd tests in a more isolated/controlled environment #62433
    Area-Compilers
  • Document Outline Feature #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Immediately filter syntax trees down to those that either have attributes or global-using-aliases. #62483
    Area-Compilers
  • When we're removing the last project, fire SolutionRemoved #62257
    Area-IDE
  • [WIP] improve test partitioning #62138
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Provide parse options to the language service more quickly #60855
    Area-Compilers
  • Use "file local types" instead of "file types" #62514
    Area-Compilers
  • Give a specific message when analyzer references a more-recent compiler version #61261
    Area-Compilers, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Change ServiceHub host names #60778
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow Roslyn to access any evaluation properties and items #62445
    Area-IDE
  • Enable .Net Core OOP by default #60163
    Area-IDE
  • Use secondary buffer in contained language file paths #62488
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Node Selection Incomplete member and Global Statement fix #62509
    Bug, Area-IDE
  • EnC: A couple of small fixes #62454
    Area-Interactive
  • Handle diff3 conflict markers #62391
    Area-Compilers
  • Track used local constants in attributes #62158
    Area-Compilers, Community
